attributes.action: reinstate the full budget funding for sixth form provision in all schools & colleges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 31st March the government announced at 4% cut in sixth form funding. It did so with the announcement that "no school or college will be getting a cut in funding per learner" The cut was implemented by only funding 96% of the learners enrolled. Schools and colleges are facing budget deficits with only 1 day’s notice of the cut. If the government is committed to education provision for post-16's it must reinstate the full budget funding for sixth form provision in all schools & colleges and we the under signed call on them to do so.
